verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came also unto me, saying <WH559>,
Thou shalt not take <WH3947> thee a wife <WH802>, neither shalt thou have sons <WH1121> or daughters <WH1323> in this place <WH4725>.

They shall die <WH4191> of grievous <WH8463> deaths <WH4463>; they shall not be lamented <WH5594>; neither shall they be buried <WH6912>; but they shall be as dung <WH1828> upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>: and they shall be consumed <WH3615> by the sword <WH2719>, and by famine <WH7458>; and their carcases <WH5038> shall be meat <WH3978> for the fowls <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064>, and for the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>.

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, Enter <WH935> not into the house <WH1004> of mourning <WH4798>, neither go <WH3212> to lament <WH5594> nor bemoan <WH5110> them: for I have taken away <WH622> my peace <WH7965> from this people <WH5971>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, even lovingkindness <WH2617> and mercies <WH7356>. mourning: or, mourning feast

Both the great <WH1419> and the small <WH6996> shall die <WH4191> in this land <WH776>: they shall not be buried <WH6912>, neither shall men lament <WH5594> for them, nor cut <WH1413> themselves, nor make themselves bald <WH7139> for them:

Neither shall men tear <WH6536> themselves for them in mourning <WH60>, to comfort <WH5162> them for the dead <WH4191>; neither shall men give them the cup <WH3563> of consolation <WH8575> to drink <WH8248> for their father <WH1> or for their mother <WH517>. tear: or, break bread for them
Thou shalt not also go <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of feasting <WH4960>, to sit <WH3427> with them to eat <WH398> and to drink <WH8354>.

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Behold, I will cause to cease <WH7673> out of this place <WH4725> in your eyes <WH5869>, and in your days <WH3117>, the voice <WH6963> of mirth <WH8342>, and the voice <WH6963> of gladness <WH8057>, the voice <WH6963> of the bridegroom <WH2860>, and the voice <WH6963> of the bride <WH3618>.

And it shall come to pass, when thou shalt shew <WH5046> this people <WH5971> all these words <WH1697>, and they shall say <WH559> unto thee, Wherefore hath the LORD <WH3068> pronounced <WH1696> all this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451> against us? or what is our iniquity <WH5771>? or what is our sin <WH2403> that we have committed <WH2398> against the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>?

Then shalt thou say <WH559> unto them, Because your fathers <WH1> have forsaken <WH5800> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, and have walked <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and have served <WH5647> them, and have worshipped <WH7812> them, and have forsaken <WH5800> me, and have not kept <WH8104> my law <WH8451>;

And ye have done <WH6213> worse <WH7489> than your fathers <WH1>; for, behold <WH2009>, ye walk <WH1980> every one <WH376> after <WH310> the imagination <WH8307> of his evil <WH7451> heart <WH3820>, that they may not hearken <WH8085> unto me: imagination: or, stubbornness

Therefore will I cast <WH2904> you out of this land <WH776> into a land <WH776> that ye know <WH3045> not, neither ye nor your fathers <WH1>; and there shall ye serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>; where I will not shew <WH5414> you favour <WH2594>.

Therefore, behold, the days <WH3117> come <WH935>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, that it shall no more be said <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, that brought up <WH5927> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>;

But, The LORD <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, that brought up <WH5927> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from the land <WH776> of the north <WH6828>, and from all the lands <WH776> whither he had driven <WH5080> them: and I will bring them again <WH7725> into their land <WH127> that I gave <WH5414> unto their fathers <WH1>.

Behold, I will send <WH7971> for many <WH7227> fishers <WH1771> <WH1728>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, and they shall fish <WH1770> them; and after <WH310> will I send <WH7971> for many <WH7227> hunters <WH6719>, and they shall hunt <WH6679> them from every mountain <WH2022>, and from every hill <WH1389>, and out of the holes <WH5357> of the rocks <WH5553>.
For mine eyes <WH5869> are upon all their ways <WH1870>: they are not hid <WH5641> from my face <WH6440>, neither is their iniquity <WH5771> hid <WH6845> from <WH5048> mine eyes <WH5869>.

And first <WH7223> I will recompense <WH7999> their iniquity <WH5771> and their sin <WH2403> double <WH4932>; because they have defiled <WH2490> my land <WH776>, they have filled <WH4390> mine inheritance <WH5159> with the carcases <WH5038> of their detestable <WH8251> and abominable things <WH8441>.

O LORD <WH3068>, my strength <WH5797>, and my fortress <WH4581>, and my refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of affliction <WH6869>, the Gentiles <WH1471> shall come <WH935> unto thee from the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>, and shall say <WH559>, Surely our fathers <WH1> have inherited <WH5157> lies <WH8267>, vanity <WH1892>, and things wherein there is no profit <WH3276>.
Shall a man <WH120> make <WH6213> gods <WH430> unto himself, and they are no gods <WH430>?

Therefore, behold, I will this once <WH6471> cause them to know <WH3045>, I will cause them to know <WH3045> mine hand <WH3027> and my might <WH1369>; and they shall know <WH3045> that my name <WH8034> is The LORD <WH3068>. The LORD: or, JEHOVAH
